block.p: Jessica Viertel, the daughter of Toni W. Viertel and Thomas Viertel, both of New York, is to be married today to Stephen Andrew Swenson, a son of Nancy and James Swenson of Hernando, Fla. The Rev. Dr. Melvin Hawthorne, an ecumenical minister, will officiate at the TriBeCa Rooftop in New York.

Ms. Viertel, 28, is a research associate at Seidmon Associates, a media consulting company in New York. She graduated cum laude from Harvard University. Her father is a Broadway producer and the chief financial officer of the Presidential Realty Corporation in White Plains. Her mother is a psychotherapist in New York.

Jessica Viertel, the daughter of Toni W. Viertel and Thomas Viertel, both of New York, is to be married today to Stephen Andrew Swenson, a son of Nancy and James Swenson of Hernando, Fla. The Rev. Dr. Melvin Hawthorne, an ecumenical minister, will officiate at the TriBeCa Rooftop in New York.

Ms. Viertel, 28, is a research associate at Seidmon Associates, a media consulting company in New York. She graduated cum laude from Harvard University. Her father is a Broadway producer and the chief financial officer of the Presidential Realty Corporation in White Plains. Her mother is a psychotherapist in New York.

Mr. Swenson, 30, is a theatrical set and lighting designer in New York. He graduated from Moorhead State University. His father retired as the legal administrator for the Blue Valley Lutheran Nursing Home in Hebron, Neb. His mother retired as the executive director of the Bismarck-Mandan Symphony Orchestra in Bismarck, N.D.
